scripts.lint: bun run --filter web lint && bun run --filter data-worker lint
scripts.build: bun run --filter web build && bun run --filter data-worker build
scripts.start: bun run --filter web start && bun run --filter data-worker start
scripts.dev: sh -c 'trap "kill -TERM 0" INT TERM EXIT; bun run --filter web dev & bun run --filter data-worker dev' & wait
